content:
Certainly! Here are the bullet points for each of the regions in Roraima, organized in a grid for comparison:

| Region | Suitable crops | Suitable livestock |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Branco River | Rice, beans, cassava | Cattle |
| Pacaraima Mountains | - | Goats, sheep, dairy cattle |
| Serra do Tepequém | Rice, beans, cassava | Cattle |

Overall, the Branco River region is suitable for a wide range of crops and cattle farming, while the Pacaraima Mountains region is particularly suitable for livestock farming, particularly goats, sheep, and dairy cattle. The Serra do Tepequém region is suitable for cattle farming and growing crops such as rice, beans, and cassava.
